args.natural_language_statement: In any Hausdorff space, every compact set is closed.

retrieved_examples.nl: Every compact subset of a Hausdorff space is closed.
retrieved_examples.lean:
import Mathlib

theorem is_compact.is_closed [TopologicalSpace α] {K : Set α} (hK : IsCompact K) [T2Space α] : IsClosed K := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib
open Set Filter Topology TopologicalSpace Function

/-- In any Hausdorff space, every compact set is closed. -/
theorem isClosed_of_isCompact {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] [T2Space X] {K : Set X} (hK : IsCompact K) :
  IsClosed K := by sorry
